Interests

My interests fall broadly in Condensed Matter Physics and (scientific) computing.

  • Physics

    • New states of matter, such as Topological Insulators
    • Quantum Computing

  • Programming

    • I am interested in scientific computation, and I plan to contribute someday to a few open source projects.
